data.title: Isabella of Castille - Vocab, Definition, and Must Know Facts
data.meta_description: Isabella I was the Queen of Castile from 1474 until her death in 1504. She married Ferdinand II of Aragon, which led to a united Spain. She is also known for financing Christopher Columbus' voyage to America.
data.text:
Definition

Isabella I was the Queen of Castile from 1474 until her death in 1504. She married Ferdinand II of Aragon, which led to a united Spain. She is also known for financing Christopher Columbus' voyage to America.
